titles.title: State and National Guard Fairness Act of 2020
To allow expenses in connection with the performance of services as a member of a reserve component or State defense forces to be taken into account as a miscellaneous itemized deduction.
State and National Guard Fairness Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
State and National Guard Fairness Act of 2020
This bill allows a miscellaneous itemized deduction for unreimbursed expenses incurred by members of an Armed Forces reserve component or state defense forces.
